channel.title: Oblivion
channel.description:
So, just wanted to get peoples' opinions on Oblivion. Before I actually saw it, I heard from people that it sucked and that it was terrible. I honestly thought it was a good movie. A mind fucker yes, but still had a good story line. The only thing I was disappointed in is that we didn't actually see another race, just a floating pyramid computer thingy. :o
Opinions?

item.title: Oblivion
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I’ve never seen the movie, but the trailer looks interesting enough.
The part where they create people to follow the orders reminds me of another movie I saw a while back, called The Island (that’s a bad trailer, there’s more on YouTube)

Read full topic
